mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_INV_TR
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_INV_TR (tr_no, tr_out_wh_id, tr_in_wh_id, need_dept_id, need_date, app_dept_id, app_user, app_date, status, if_manual_close, memo, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time, processType) values (#{tr_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tr_out_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tr_in_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{need_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{need_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{app_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{app_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{app_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{if_manual_close,jdbcType=BIT}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update TB_INV_TR
tr_no = #{record.tr_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tr_out_wh_id = #{record.tr_out_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tr_in_wh_id = #{record.tr_in_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_dept_id = #{record.need_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_date = #{record.need_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
app_dept_id = #{record.app_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_user = #{record.app_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_date = #{record.app_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
if_manual_close = #{record.if_manual_close,jdbcType=BIT},
memo = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
processType = #{record.processType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TB_INV_TR set tr_no = #{record.tr_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tr_out_wh_id = #{record.tr_out_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tr_in_wh_id = #{record.tr_in_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_dept_id = #{record.need_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_date = #{record.need_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, app_dept_id = #{record.app_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_user = #{record.app_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_date = #{record.app_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, if_manual_close = #{record.if_manual_close,jdbcType=BIT}, memo = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, processType = #{record.processType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_INV_TR
tr_out_wh_id = #{tr_out_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tr_in_wh_id = #{tr_in_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_dept_id = #{need_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_date = #{need_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
app_dept_id = #{app_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_user = #{app_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_date = #{app_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
if_manual_close = #{if_manual_close,jdbcType=BIT},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
processType = #{processType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tr_no = #{tr_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_INV_TR set tr_out_wh_id = #{tr_out_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tr_in_wh_id = #{tr_in_wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_dept_id = #{need_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_date = #{need_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, app_dept_id = #{app_dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_user = #{app_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_date = #{app_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, if_manual_close = #{if_manual_close,jdbcType=BIT}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, processType = #{processType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tr_no = #{tr_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(TR_QTY) FROM TB_INV_TR_ACT WHERE TR_NO = #{trNo} AND IF_TR_IN = 1 GROUP BY TR_NO

SELECT A.TR_NO,A.NEED_DATE,A.APP_DATE,A.TR_IN_WH_ID,A.TR_OUT_WH_ID, A.NEED_DEPT_ID,APP_DEPT_ID,A.APP_USER, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_SYS_LOOKUP WHERE TYPE='INV_TR_STATUS' AND CODE=A.STATUS) statusDscr, (SELECT WH_NAME FROM TB_INV_WAREHOUSE WHERE WH_ID=A.TR_OUT_WH_ID) trOutWhIdDscr, (SELECT WH_NAME FROM TB_INV_WAREHOUSE WHERE WH_ID=A.TR_IN_WH_ID) trInWhIdDscr, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM TB_ORG_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID=A.NEED_DEPT_ID) needDeptIdDscr, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM TB_ORG_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID=A.APP_DEPT_ID) appDeptIdDscr, (SELECT CHN_NM FROM TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL WHERE PSN_NO=A.APP_USER) appUserDscr FROM TB_INV_TR A WHERE A.TR_NO=#{trNo}
select max(tr_no) from TB_INV_TR where TR_NO like '%'+#{trNo}+'%'
